updatedContent
originalContent
updatedContent
originalContent
option.value:
<vector xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:width="120dp" android:height="120dp" android:viewportWidth="120" android:viewportHeight="120">
<!-- Fox/Kitsune mask design --> <group android:translateX="60" android:translateY="60">
<!-- Mask base --> <path android:fillColor="@color/golden_yellow" android:pathData="M-30,-40 C-35,-45 -40,-40 -40,-30 L-40,30 C-40,40 -30,45 0,45 C30,45 40,40 40,30 L40,-30 C40,-40 35,-45 30,-40 L30,-35 C25,-45 15,-45 10,-35 L0,-30 L-10,-35 C-15,-45 -25,-45 -30,-35 Z" />
<!-- Eye markings --> <path android:fillColor="#B8860B" android:pathData="M-20,-20 C-25,-25 -15,-30 -10,-25 L-5,-20 C0,-15 -5,-10 -10,-15 L-15,-20 Z" />
<path android:fillColor="#B8860B" android:pathData="M20,-20 C25,-25 15,-30 10,-25 L5,-20 C0,-15 5,-10 10,-15 L15,-20 Z" />
<!-- Eyes --> <circle android:fillColor="@color/black" android:cx="-12" android:cy="-15" android:radius="3" />
<circle android:fillColor="@color/black" android:cx="12" android:cy="-15" android:radius="3" />
<!-- Nose --> <path android:fillColor="@color/black" android:pathData="M0,5 L-3,10 L3,10 Z" />
<!-- Mouth --> <path android:fillColor="@color/black" android:strokeColor="@color/black" android:strokeWidth="2" android:pathData="M0,15 C-5,20 -10,15 -8,10 M0,15 C5,20 10,15 8,10" />
</group>
</vector>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<vector xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:width="120dp" android:height="120dp" android:viewportWidth="120" android:viewportHeight="120">
<!-- Fox/Kitsune mask design --> <group android:translateX="60" android:translateY="60">
<!-- Mask base --> <path android:fillColor="@color/golden_yellow" android:pathData="M-30,-40 C-35,-45 -40,-40 -40,-30 L-40,30 C-40,40 -30,45 0,45 C30,45 40,40 40,30 L40,-30 C40,-40 35,-45 30,-40 L30,-35 C25,-45 15,-45 10,-35 L0,-30 L-10,-35 C-15,-45 -25,-45 -30,-35 Z" />
<!-- Eye markings --> <path android:fillColor="#B8860B" android:pathData="M-20,-20 C-25,-25 -15,-30 -10,-25 L-5,-20 C0,-15 -5,-10 -10,-15 L-15,-20 Z" />
<path android:fillColor="#B8860B" android:pathData="M20,-20 C25,-25 15,-30 10,-25 L5,-20 C0,-15 5,-10 10,-15 L15,-20 Z" />
<!-- Eyes --> <path android:fillColor="@color/black" android:pathData="M-12,-15 C-12,-16.66 -10.66,-18 -9,-18 C-7.34,-18 -6,-16.66 -6,-15 C-6,-13.34 -7.34,-12 -9,-12 C-10.66,-12 -12,-13.34 -12,-15 Z" />
<path android:fillColor="@color/black" android:pathData="M12,-15 C12,-16.66 13.34,-18 15,-18 C16.66,-18 18,-16.66 18,-15 C18,-13.34 16.66,-12 15,-12 C13.34,-12 12,-13.34 12,-15 Z" />
<!-- Nose --> <path android:fillColor="@color/black" android:pathData="M0,5 L-3,10 L3,10 Z" />
<!-- Mouth --> <path android:fillColor="@color/black" android:strokeColor="@color/black" android:strokeWidth="2" android:pathData="M0,15 C-5,20 -10,15 -8,10 M0,15 C5,20 10,15 8,10" />
</group>
</vector>

option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <shape xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:shape="rectangle">
<solid android:color="@android:color/transparent"></solid> </shape>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <layer-list xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"> <!-- Transparent background --> <item> <shape android:shape="rectangle"> <solid android:color="@android:color/transparent" /> </shape> </item>
<!-- Bottom border --> <item android:top="-1dp" android:left="-1dp" android:right="-1dp"> <shape android:shape="rectangle"> <stroke android:width="1dp" android:color="#797979" /> <solid android:color="@android:color/transparent" /> </shape> </item> </layer-list>

option.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <shape xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:shape="rectangle"> <gradient android:angle="270" android:startColor="#00000000" android:centerColor="#40000000" android:endColor="#80000000" /> </shape>

option.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <vector xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:width="24dp" android:height="24dp" android:viewportWidth="24" android:viewportHeight="24"> <path android:fillColor="@color/gray_light" android:pathData="M12,4.5C7,4.5 2.73,7.61 1,12c1.73,4.39 6,7.5 11,7.5s9.27,-3.11 11,-7.5c-1.73,-4.39 -6,-7.5 -11,-7.5zM12,17c-2.76,0 -5,-2.24 -5,-5s2.24,-5 5,-5 5,2.24 5,5 -2.24,5 -5,5zM12,9c-1.66,0 -3,1.34 -3,3s1.34,3 3,3 3,-1.34 3,-3 -1.34,-3 -3,-3z"/> </vector>

option.name: originalContent
option.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <font-family xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"> <font android:fontStyle="normal" android:fontWeight="100" android:font="@font/poppins_thin" /> <font android:fontStyle="normal" android:fontWeight="200" android:font="@font/poppins_extralight" /> <font android:fontStyle="normal" android:fontWeight="300" android:font="@font/poppins_light" /> <font android:fontStyle="normal" android:fontWeight="400" android:font="@font/poppins_regular" /> <font android:fontStyle="normal" android:fontWeight="500" android:font="@font/poppins_medium" /> <font android:fontStyle="normal" android:fontWeight="600" android:font="@font/poppins_semibold" /> <font android:fontStyle="normal" android:fontWeight="700" android:font="@font/poppins_bold" /> <font android:fontStyle="normal" android:fontWeight="800" android:font="@font/poppins_extrabold" /> <font android:fontStyle="normal" android:fontWeight="900" android:font="@font/poppins_black" /> </font-family>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <font-family xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"> <font android:fontStyle="normal" android:fontWeight="100" android:font="@font/poppins_thin" /> <font android:fontStyle="normal" android:fontWeight="300" android:font="@font/poppins_light" /> <font android:fontStyle="normal" android:fontWeight="400" android:font="@font/poppins_regular" /> <font android:fontStyle="normal" android:fontWeight="500" android:font="@font/poppins_medium" /> <font android:fontStyle="normal" android:fontWeight="600" android:font="@font/poppins_semibold" /> <font android:fontStyle="normal" android:fontWeight="700" android:font="@font/poppins_bold" /> </font-family>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <RelativeLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@drawable/login_background" android:fitsSystemWindows="true">
<!-- Dark overlay for better text readability --> <View android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@color/dark_overlay" />
<!-- Main content container --> <ScrollView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:fillViewport="true">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:gravity="center" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="32dp">
<!-- Logo and App Name --> <ImageView android:id="@+id/iv_logo" android:layout_width="126dp" android:layout_height="126dp" android:layout_marginTop="50dp" android:layout_marginBottom="36dp" android:src="@drawable/anime_dxd_logo" />
<!-- Login Form Section --> <TextView android:id="@+id/tv_login_title" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="0dp" android:fontFamily="@font/go3v2" android:text="LOGIN WITH YOUR ACCOUNT" android:textAlignment="textEnd" android:textColor="@color/golden_yellow" android:textSize="15sp" android:textStyle="bold" />
<!-- Username Input --> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout style="@style/CustomTextInputLayout" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/et_username" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins" android:hint="Username" android:background="@drawable/bg_input" android:inputType="text" android:maxLines="1" android:padding="16dp" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textColorHint="@color/gray_light" android:textAlignment="textEnd" android:gravity="end" />
</com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<!-- Password Input --> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout style="@style/CustomTextInputLayout" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" app:endIconMode="password_toggle" app:endIconTint="@color/gray_light" android:layoutDirection="rtl">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/et_password" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:background="@drawable/bg_input" android:gravity="end" android:hint="Password" android:inputType="textPassword" android:maxLines="1" android:padding="16dp" android:textAlignment="textEnd" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textColorHint="@color/gray_light" android:layoutDirection="rtl" />
</com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<!-- Forgot Password --> <TextView android:id="@+id/tv_forgot_password" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_gravity="start" android:layout_marginBottom="40dp" android:background="?android:attr/selectableItemBackground" android:clickable="true" android:focusable="true" android:fontFamily="@font/go3v2" android:padding="8dp" android:text="FORGOT YOUR PASSWORD" android:textColor="@color/gray_light" android:textSize="14sp" />
<!-- Login Button --> <Button android:id="@+id/btn_login" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="56dp" android:layout_marginBottom="40dp" android:background="@drawable/login_button_background" android:fontFamily="@font/go3v2" android:letterSpacing="0.05" android:text="LOGIN NOW" android:textColor="@color/black" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" />
<!-- Social Login Section --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="24dp" android:gravity="center" android:orientation="horizontal" android:paddingHorizontal="60dp">
<!-- Left horizontal line --> <View android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="1dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" android:background="@color/gray_light" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:fontFamily="@font/go3v2" android:text="LOGIN WITH" android:textColor="@color/gray_light" android:textSize="14sp" />
<!-- Right horizontal line --> <View android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="1dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:background="@color/gray_light" />
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Social Login Buttons --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:gravity="center" android:orientation="horizontal">
<!-- Google Login --> <FrameLayout android:id="@+id/btn_google_login" android:layout_width="60dp" android:layout_height="60dp" android:layout_margin="8dp" android:background="@drawable/social_button_background" android:clickable="true" android:focusable="true">
<ImageView android:layout_width="32dp" android:layout_height="32dp" android:layout_gravity="center" android:src="@drawable/ic_google" />
</FrameLayout>
<!-- Apple Login --> <FrameLayout android:id="@+id/btn_apple_login" android:layout_width="60dp" android:layout_height="60dp" android:layout_margin="8dp" android:background="@drawable/social_button_background" android:clickable="true" android:focusable="true">
<ImageView android:layout_width="32dp" android:layout_height="32dp" android:layout_gravity="center" android:src="@drawable/ic_apple" />
</FrameLayout>
<!-- Facebook Login --> <FrameLayout android:id="@+id/btn_facebook_login" android:layout_width="60dp" android:layout_height="60dp" android:layout_margin="8dp" android:background="@drawable/social_button_background" android:clickable="true" android:focusable="true">
<ImageView android:layout_width="32dp" android:layout_height="32dp" android:layout_gravity="center" android:src="@drawable/ic_facebook" />
</FrameLayout>
</LinearLayout>
</LinearLayout>
</ScrollView>
</RelativeLayout>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <RelativeLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@drawable/login_background" android:fitsSystemWindows="true">
<!-- Sukuna image on the left --> <ImageView android:id="@+id/iv_sukuna" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:layout_alignParentStart="true" android:layout_alignParentTop="true" android:scaleType="centerCrop" android:src="@drawable/sukuna" android:alpha="0.7" android:contentDescription="Sukuna background" />
<!-- Gojo image on the right --> <ImageView android:id="@+id/iv_gojo" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:layout_alignParentEnd="true" android:layout_alignParentTop="true" android:scaleType="centerCrop" android:src="@drawable/gojo" android:alpha="0.7" android:contentDescription="Gojo background" />
<!-- Dark overlay for better text readability --> <View android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@color/dark_overlay" />
<!-- Main content container --> <ScrollView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:fillViewport="true">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:gravity="center" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="32dp">
<!-- Logo and App Name --> <ImageView android:id="@+id/iv_logo" android:layout_width="126dp" android:layout_height="126dp" android:layout_marginTop="50dp" android:layout_marginBottom="36dp" android:src="@drawable/anime_dxd_logo" />
<!-- Login Form Section --> <TextView android:id="@+id/tv_login_title" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="0dp" android:fontFamily="@font/go3v2" android:text="LOGIN WITH YOUR ACCOUNT" android:textAlignment="textEnd" android:textColor="@color/golden_yellow" android:textSize="15sp" android:textStyle="bold" />
<!-- Username Input --> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout style="@style/CustomTextInputLayout" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/et_username" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:fontFamily="@font/poppins" android:hint="Username" android:background="@drawable/bg_input" android:inputType="text" android:maxLines="1" android:padding="16dp" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textColorHint="@color/gray_light" android:textAlignment="textEnd" android:gravity="end" />
</com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<!-- Password Input --> <com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout style="@style/CustomTextInputLayout" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" app:endIconMode="password_toggle" app:endIconTint="@color/gray_light" android:layoutDirection="rtl">
<com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputEditText android:id="@+id/et_password" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:background="@drawable/bg_input" android:gravity="end" android:hint="Password" android:inputType="textPassword" android:maxLines="1" android:padding="16dp" android:textAlignment="textEnd" android:textColor="@color/white" android:textColorHint="@color/gray_light" android:layoutDirection="rtl" />
</com.google.android.material.textfield.TextInputLayout>
<!-- Forgot Password --> <TextView android:id="@+id/tv_forgot_password" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_gravity="start" android:layout_marginBottom="40dp" android:background="?android:attr/selectableItemBackground" android:clickable="true" android:focusable="true" android:fontFamily="@font/go3v2" android:padding="8dp" android:text="FORGOT YOUR PASSWORD" android:textColor="@color/gray_light" android:textSize="14sp" />
<!-- Login Button --> <Button android:id="@+id/btn_login" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="56dp" android:layout_marginBottom="40dp" android:background="@drawable/login_button_background" android:fontFamily="@font/go3v2" android:letterSpacing="0.05" android:text="LOGIN NOW" android:textColor="@color/black" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" />
<!-- Social Login Section --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="24dp" android:gravity="center" android:orientation="horizontal" android:paddingHorizontal="60dp">
<!-- Left horizontal line --> <View android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="1dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" android:background="@color/gray_light" />
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:fontFamily="@font/go3v2" android:text="LOGIN WITH" android:textColor="@color/gray_light" android:textSize="14sp" />
<!-- Right horizontal line --> <View android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="1dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:layout_marginStart="16dp" android:background="@color/gray_light" />
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Social Login Buttons --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:gravity="center" android:orientation="horizontal">
<!-- Google Login --> <FrameLayout android:id="@+id/btn_google_login" android:layout_width="60dp" android:layout_height="60dp" android:layout_margin="8dp" android:background="@drawable/social_button_background" android:clickable="true" android:focusable="true">
<ImageView android:layout_width="32dp" android:layout_height="32dp" android:layout_gravity="center" android:src="@drawable/ic_google" />
</FrameLayout>
<!-- Apple Login --> <FrameLayout android:id="@+id/btn_apple_login" android:layout_width="60dp" android:layout_height="60dp" android:layout_margin="8dp" android:background="@drawable/social_button_background" android:clickable="true" android:focusable="true">
<ImageView android:layout_width="32dp" android:layout_height="32dp" android:layout_gravity="center" android:src="@drawable/ic_apple" />
</FrameLayout>
<!-- Facebook Login --> <FrameLayout android:id="@+id/btn_facebook_login" android:layout_width="60dp" android:layout_height="60dp" android:layout_margin="8dp" android:background="@drawable/social_button_background" android:clickable="true" android:focusable="true">
<ImageView android:layout_width="32dp" android:layout_height="32dp" android:layout_gravity="center" android:src="@drawable/ic_facebook" />
</FrameLayout>
</LinearLayout>
</LinearLayout>
</ScrollView>
</RelativeLayout>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <ScrollView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@color/background_dark" tools:context=".ui.home.HomeFragment">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="16dp">
<!-- Header Section --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:layout_marginBottom="24dp">
<!-- Hamburger Menu Icon --> <ImageView android:id="@+id/menu_icon" android:layout_width="24dp" android:layout_height="24dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_menu" android:tint="@color/text_primary" android:contentDescription="Menu" />
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Welcome Section --> <TextView android:id="@+id/welcome_title" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/welcome_title" android:textSize="28sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/welcome_description" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/welcome_description" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="@color/text_secondary" android:lineSpacingExtra="4dp" android:layout_marginBottom="24dp" />
<!-- News/Manga Toggle --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="48dp" android:background="@drawable/toggle_background" android:layout_marginBottom="24dp">
<TextView android:id="@+id/news_tab" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="@string/news_tab" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:gravity="center" android:background="@drawable/tab_selected" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/manga_tab" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="@string/manga_tab" android:textColor="@color/text_secondary" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:gravity="center" />
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Featured Content Section --> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="200dp" android:layout_marginBottom="24dp" app:cardCornerRadius="12dp" app:cardElevation="0dp">
<FrameLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/featured_image" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:scaleType="centerCrop" android:src="@drawable/featured_anime" android:contentDescription="Featured Anime" />
<View android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@drawable/gradient_overlay" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_gravity="bottom" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="16dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/action_label" android:textColor="@color/accent_orange" android:textSize="12sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginBottom="4dp" />
<TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/featured_title" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginBottom="4dp" />
<TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/featured_subtitle" android:textColor="@color/text_secondary" android:textSize="14sp" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" />
<TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/featured_description" android:textColor="@color/text_secondary" android:textSize="12sp" android:maxLines="2" android:ellipsize="end" />
</LinearLayout>
</FrameLayout>
</androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<!-- Weekly Top 3 Section --> <TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/weekly_top_3" android:textColor="@color/section_header" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" />
<androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/weekly_top_recyclerview" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:layout_marginBottom="32dp" tools:listitem="@layout/item_weekly_top" />
<!-- Recent News Section --> <TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/recent_news" android:textColor="@color/section_header" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" />
<androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/recent_news_recyclerview" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="32dp" tools:listitem="@layout/item_recent_news" />
<!-- Latest Review Section --> <TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/latest_review" android:textColor="@color/section_header" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" />
<androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/latest_review_recyclerview" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" tools:listitem="@layout/item_latest_review" />
</LinearLayout>
</ScrollView>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <ScrollView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@color/background_dark" tools:context=".ui.home.HomeFragment">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="16dp">
<!-- Header Section --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:layout_marginBottom="24dp">
<!-- Hamburger Menu Icon --> <ImageView android:id="@+id/menu_icon" android:layout_width="24dp" android:layout_height="24dp" android:src="@drawable/ic_menu" app:tint="@color/text_primary" android:contentDescription="@string/menu_description" />
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Welcome Section --> <TextView android:id="@+id/welcome_title" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/welcome_title" android:textSize="28sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/welcome_description" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/welcome_description" android:textSize="14sp" android:textColor="@color/text_secondary" android:lineSpacingExtra="4dp" android:layout_marginBottom="24dp" />
<!-- News/Manga Toggle --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="48dp" android:background="@drawable/toggle_background" android:layout_marginBottom="24dp">
<TextView android:id="@+id/news_tab" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="@string/news_tab" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:gravity="center" android:background="@drawable/tab_selected" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/manga_tab" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="@string/manga_tab" android:textColor="@color/text_secondary" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:gravity="center" />
</LinearLayout>
<!-- Featured Content Section --> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="200dp" android:layout_marginBottom="24dp" app:cardCornerRadius="12dp" app:cardElevation="0dp">
<FrameLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/featured_image" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:scaleType="centerCrop" android:src="@drawable/featured_anime" android:contentDescription="@string/featured_anime_description" />
<View android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@drawable/gradient_overlay" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_gravity="bottom" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="16dp">
<TextView android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/action_label" android:textColor="@color/accent_orange" android:textSize="12sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginBottom="4dp" />
<TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/featured_title" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginBottom="4dp" />
<TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/featured_subtitle" android:textColor="@color/text_secondary" android:textSize="14sp" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" />
<TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/featured_description" android:textColor="@color/text_secondary" android:textSize="12sp" android:maxLines="2" android:ellipsize="end" />
</LinearLayout>
</FrameLayout>
</androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>
<!-- Weekly Top 3 Section --> <TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/weekly_top_3" android:textColor="@color/section_header" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" />
<androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/weekly_top_recyclerview" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:layout_marginBottom="32dp" tools:listitem="@layout/item_weekly_top" />
<!-- Recent News Section --> <TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/recent_news" android:textColor="@color/section_header" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" />
<androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/recent_news_recyclerview" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="32dp" tools:listitem="@layout/item_recent_news" />
<!-- Latest Review Section --> <TextView android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/latest_review" android:textColor="@color/section_header" android:textSize="18sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" />
<androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/latest_review_recyclerview" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" tools:listitem="@layout/item_latest_review" />
</LinearLayout>
</ScrollView>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp" app:cardCornerRadius="12dp" app:cardElevation="4dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="@color/card_background">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:padding="16dp">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/review_image" android:layout_width="80dp" android:layout_height="80dp" android:scaleType="centerCrop" android:src="@drawable/featured_anime" android:background="@drawable/rounded_corners" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_marginStart="16dp">
<TextView android:id="@+id/review_title" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Attack On Titan" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" android:textSize="16sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginBottom="4dp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/review_subtitle" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Attack On Titan" android:textColor="@color/text_secondary" android:textSize="12sp" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:layout_marginBottom="8dp">
<TextView android:id="@+id/review_rating" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="★★★★★" android:textColor="@color/golden_yellow" android:textSize="14sp" />
</LinearLayout>
<TextView android:id="@+id/review_description" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Whispers from the Abyss: A harrowing tale that gripped us from the first episode..." android:textColor="@color/text_secondary" android:textSize="12sp" android:maxLines="3" android:ellipsize="end" android:layout_marginBottom="12dp" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal">
<TextView android:id="@+id/reply_button" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text=" Reply to this review" android:textColor="@color/accent_orange" android:textSize="12sp" android:layout_marginEnd="16dp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/share_button" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text=" Share this review" android:textColor="@color/accent_orange" android:textSize="12sp" />
</LinearLayout>
</LinearLayout>
</LinearLayout>
</androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="horizontal" android:padding="12dp" android:layout_marginBottom="16dp">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/news_image" android:layout_width="60dp" android:layout_height="60dp" android:scaleType="centerCrop" android:src="@drawable/featured_anime" android:background="@drawable/rounded_corners" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:layout_weight="1" android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_marginStart="12dp">
<TextView android:id="@+id/news_date" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Posted on May 30, 2025" android:textColor="@color/text_secondary" android:textSize="12sp" android:layout_marginBottom="4dp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/news_title" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Attack On Titan" android:textColor="@color/accent_orange" android:textSize="14sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginBottom="4dp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/news_description" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="In a world where humanity is on the brink of extinction due to giant humanoid creatures known as Titans..." android:textColor="@color/text_secondary" android:textSize="12sp" android:maxLines="2" android:ellipsize="end" />
</LinearLayout>
</LinearLayout>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.cardview.widget.CardView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="120dp" android:layout_height="160dp" android:layout_marginEnd="12dp" app:cardCornerRadius="8dp" app:cardElevation="4dp" app:cardBackgroundColor="@color/card_background">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:orientation="vertical">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/anime_image" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="100dp" android:scaleType="centerCrop" android:src="@drawable/featured_anime" />
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="8dp">
<TextView android:id="@+id/anime_title" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Haikyuu!!" android:textColor="@color/text_primary" android:textSize="12sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:maxLines="2" android:ellipsize="end" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/anime_genre" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="ACTION" android:textColor="@color/text_secondary" android:textSize="10sp" android:layout_marginTop="4dp" />
</LinearLayout>
</LinearLayout>
</androidx.cardview.widget.CardView>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<resources> <string name="app_name">AnimeDXD</string> <string name="title_home">Home</string> <string name="title_dashboard">Dashboard</string> <string name="title_notifications">Notifications</string>
<!-- Home Page Strings --> <string name="welcome_title">WELCOME.</string> <string name="welcome_description">Discover the latest anime news, trending manga, and your favorite characters, all in one place. Stay updated, explore, and dive into the world of anime like never before.</string> <string name="news_tab">NEWS</string> <string name="manga_tab">MANGA</string> <string name="action_label">ACTION</string> <string name="featured_title">Demon Chronicles: Ashes of War</string> <string name="featured_subtitle">The Ultimate Quest</string> <string name="featured_description">A forgotten warrior rises from the ruins to challenge the empire that betrayed him. Will vengeance bring peace or destruction?</string> <string name="weekly_top_3">WEEKLY TOP 3</string> <string name="recent_news">RECENT NEWS</string> <string name="latest_review">LATEST REVIEW</string> <string name="posted_on">Posted on %s</string> <string name="attack_on_titan">Attack On Titan</string> <string name="demon_slayer">Demon Slayer</string> <string name="share_this_review">Share this review</string> </resources>
